title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Technology-Enhanced Learning for Pre-Service Teachers: COI-LbyD Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate collaborative problem-solving skills through online discussion designs based on the Community of Inquiry (COI) framework
Learners can complete educational material development projects using digital tools by applying Learning by Design (LbyD) methodology
Learners can create technology-enhanced lesson plans for pre-service teachers based on the COI-LbyD integrated model and propose improvements incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
